staff.name: Active.karam
staff.statement: Karam is the Founder of United Kingdom: Birmingham Roleplay. Karam started the server in September, 2023 and has been been running it since.

staff.name: Finn
staff.statement: Finn has been contributing to the server since 2025, quickly establishing himself as a talented developer. Leveraging his skills in web development and digital management, he now serves as a management member, helping to maintain high standards across the community's online platforms and supporting the objectives of the server with professionalism and innovation.
